sentences.english: Range is about 35km but altitude is good.
sentences.chinese: 它的射程只有35公里，但是射高很好。

sentences.english: The range of the water cannon is 55 meters.
To launch a torpedo the ship has to be within firing range (in the game, this is approximately 1km).
sentences.chinese: 艦船要發射一杖魚雷必須在射程範圍內。

sentences.english: I guess both ships were out of nerf gun range.
sentences.chinese: 我猜這兩艘船都在勒夫槍的射程之外。

sentences.english: Basic design 9mm semi-automatic gun. 12 shot clip. Long-range weapon.
sentences.chinese: 基本設計爲9公釐口徑半自動手槍，12發，長射程。

sentences.english: If you are forward of your position, the artillery will fall short.
sentences.chinese: 你的戰位靠前時候，己方炮彈的射程就短了。

sentences.english: A cannon that can be fired at a high elevation for relatively short ranges.
sentences.chinese: 一種能在相對近的射程內高角度射擊的大炮。

sentences.english: The surface-to-surface missile is believed to have a range of some 2, 000 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 據信這種地對地導彈的射程爲兩千多公里。

sentences.english: American Riflemen receive longer range sticky bombs ability at Vet level 2.
sentences.chinese: 美軍步槍兵2級老練時粘性炸彈技能射程增加。

sentences.english: The avatar has great range, it is one of the closest you will get to a juggernaut .
sentences.chinese: 聖靈有着很好的射程，是是你最值得崇拜的之一。

sentences.english: Their panzers broke these attacks up with long-range fire.
sentences.chinese: 他們的裝甲利用射程優勢挫敗了這些進攻。

sentences.english: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.chinese: 山上的炮樓把下面的海港地區置於射程之內。

sentences.english: Good animation, long range and shrapnel.
sentences.chinese: 很好的彈道，很遠的射程以及霰彈。

sentences.english: But it will be able to launch missiles at targets 700km (437 miles) away.
sentences.chinese: 潛艇將有能力發射射程達到700公里的導彈。

sentences.english: Once its prey enters range, the basilisk switches to its petrifying gaze attack.
sentences.chinese: 一旦其敵人進入射程，蜥怪會轉而使用石化凝視攻擊。

definition: anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
